description: The UK says the Russian satellite launched "a projectile with the characteristics of a weapon".
title: UK and US say Russia fired a satellite weapon in space
title_page: UK and US say Russia fired a satellite weapon in space - BBC News
maintext: "Actions like this threaten the peaceful use of space and risk causing debris that could pose a threat to satellites and the space systems on which the world depends," he said. He urged Russia to be "responsible" and to "avoid any further such testing".
